channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Peril of a White House That Flaunts Its Indifference to the Law
item.description: The White House has made no legal argument explaining its bald claim that the president has wartime power to summarily kill people suspected of smuggl...

item.title: On a Roll, European Leaders Meet to Bolster Support for Ukraine
item.description: Britain, the host, is framing a meeting of the “coalition of the willing” as an effort to fortify Kyiv for the winter fighting months.

item.title: Here's what experts say 'A House of Dynamite' gets wrong (and right) about nuclear war
item.description: Some praised realistic elements like the depiction of the White House situation room. But others said parts of the plot didn't ring true.

item.title: Trump Official Warns California Against Arresting Federal Agents

item.title: Federal workers go without pay today. And, NBA stars arrested for illegal gambling
item.description: Today, millions of federal workers are missing their first full paycheck since the shutdown began. And, an NBA gambling scandal has led to the arrest ...

item.title: So Long, East Wing
item.description: We look back at the history of this corner of the White House.

item.title: No historic museums were harmed in the making of this quiz. Can you score 11?
item.description: From brazen jewel heists to internet meltdowns, this week brought travesties galore.

item.title: It's supposed to be payday for many federal workers. Instead, they're getting nothing

item.title: Boo to spooky chocolate prices! It's the year of chewy, fruity Halloween treats
item.description: Sales of non-chocolate candy are growing faster than those of chocolate. With cocoa in shortage, manufacturers are changing pack sizes, adding fillers...

item.title: Rebuilding Israeli-Held Parts of Gaza: Workable or Another U.S. Pipe Dream?
item.description: There are many questions about whether the idea is feasible or doomed from the outset.

item.title: Blue Jays Face Dodgers in World Series With All of Canada Behind Them
item.description: The Blue Jays and the Dodgers play Game 1 of the World Series tonight, and for Canada’s team home-field advantage is as big as the entire country.
